div.p: Translation provided by Google, not HCCS.

h1.strong: Welcome To the Holyoke Community Charter School!

article.p: The Holyoke Community Charter School is a highly regarded institution that provides a high-quality education to a diverse population in the Holyoke area. HCCS strives to help all students to achieve their full potential, prepare them for success in college, equip them with the ability and desire for lifelong learning, and strengthen their civic, ethical, and moral values. The school maintains high standards of efficiency and accountability throughout its operation.
Through applied grants HCCS is honored to be able to serve our students free breakfast and lunch every day.

HCCS incorporates academic and behavioral supports for diverse learners into its daily curriculum. The school has dedicated departments for Special Education and English Language Learners (ELL). Accelerated curriculum is provided for advanced students.

em.strong: The next HCCS Admissions Lottery for grades KG and 6th will be held March 4, 2020 at 4:00 pm. Applications for this lottery must be received by March 3, 2020 before noon. HCCS is always accepting applications for grades KG-6. If you have questions, please contact the school.

div.p: SABIS® is a global education network that has an active presence in 20 countries on five continents.
SAGA is the alumni association serving thousands of SABIS® alumni around the world.
The SABIS® Careers website features job openings from across the global SABIS® Network.

div.p: Governor Baker ordered all Massachusetts schools to remain closed through the end of the 2019-20 school year. We will provide additional information as it becomes available.
